pages.title: Cardboard
pages.text: Use this to make a box that your cat will play in.

pages.title: Cat Gut
pages.text: If your cat dies, this might drop. Gross.

pages.title: Collar Shears
pages.text: Use these to remove a collar that you've placed on your cat.

pages.title: Creative Collar
pages.text: Gives you unlimited points to spend on your cat's talents.

pages.title: Creative Radar
pages.text: A creative-mode version of the standard radar. In addition to the radar's normal functions, TODO

pages.title: Owner Change
pages.text: This item will allow you to surrender ownership of your cat and give it to someone else.

pages.title: Radar
pages.text: Use this item to find your cats, if you forgot where they are. You will need to put a Radar Collar on the cats that you want to track.

pages.title: Radio Collar
pages.text: An item that you place on your cat so you keep track of them using the Radar.
